text:
〈その他の休日〉
• 有給休暇（入社6ヵ月後より付与・最大20日）2週間以上の連休取得可能です！
• 産前産後休暇
• 育児休暇 *復帰後時短勤務可能
• パタニティ休暇（父親の有給休暇）
• パートナーの育児休暇
• 私傷病休暇
• 介護休暇・看護休暇・家族介護休暇
• 慶弔休暇
• ボランティア休暇
• リフレッシュ休暇
trans:
<Other Leave Options>
• Paid Leave (granted after 6 months of employment, up to 20 days). Extended leave of more than 2 weeks is possible!
• Maternity Leave
• Childcare Leave *Shortened working hours possible after returning
• Paternity Leave (Paid leave for fathers)
• Parner's Childcare Leave
• Sick Leave
• Caregiver Leave / Nursing Leave / Family Care Leave
• Bereavement Leave
• Volunteer Leave
• Refresh Leave
